overview: Based on Ayelet Waldmanâ€™s Mommy Track Mysteries series of books, Applebaum centers on Juliet Applebaum (Rachelle Lefevre), a former public defender who becomes a private investigator to keep from being bored to death as a stay-at-home mom.  Began as a pilot episode to a series, however released as TV movie.
title: Applebaum
